RE Position intra monthMike Ill be in a BASICS OF RISK MANAGEMENT class from am to pm today Ill come down to check on you during lunch and try to fin where we are off in NCD Original Message From Grigsby Mike Sent Thursday October AM To Jones Monte Bike Anne Subject Position intra month My position in NCD is not matching the reports issued to Lavo Monte is showing lots long intra and the report is showing See if you can find the difference Thanks Mike

Nov th PL Cc Mike after we corrected the CGPRKINGSGATE your PL decreased to The PL did not change by much because you do not have a position at Kingsgate The gain that was seen in physical current month MTM value was offset by a loss in transport revenue The estimate was mainly off because of the price curveshift which is taken directly from TDS The difference between my estimate and the actual price curveshift totaled approximately Let me know if you have any more questions Mike Thanks Monte

Addition to PL ProceduresPST Dont forget to save a copy of the PL in the O intraWestPLsWC CAL folder as the current date Also dont forget to run the HSTRANSPORTWEST hedgestrip Ryans instructions are in the West Desk Consoidated PL Procedures file that I emailed earlier on the second tab
